channel.title: Help pls
channel.description:
ohai, I'm recently a new coder. So atm need help.. Heres my problem..
src\server\model\players\packets\commands.java:414: error: class, interface, or enum expected etc.. I've tried to look after the problem, couldnt really find anything .. (Happends in my compiler).

item.title: Help pls
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

The master command only needs one bracket. i.e:

if(playerCommand.equals("master")) { //code here }

Read full topic

item.title: Help pls
item.dc:creator: @Amgitshector Amgitshector
item.description:
@Amgitshector wrote:

		}
		if (playerCommand.startsWith("master")) {
			c.sendMessage("::Master doesn't exist, do setlevel instead!");
	        }
		}			
		if (playerCommand.startsWith("pure")) {
			c.sendMessage("::Pure doesn't exist, do setlevel instead!");
		}			
	}
}

}

	Can you tell if its this one, because I cant find the other.. If it should be anyone else it should be this one..

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- }
if (playerCommand.equals(“staffzone”) && c.playerRights >= 1) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(2012, 4751, 0);
}
if (playerCommand.equals(“saradomin”) && c.playerRights >= 2) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(2905, 3611, 8);
}
if (playerCommand.equals(“bandos”) && c.playerRights >= 2) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(2905, 3611, 12);
}
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“tele”) && c.playerRights >= 3) {
String[] arg = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (arg.length > 3)
c.getPA().movePlayer(Integer.parseInt(arg[1]),Integer.parseInt(arg[2]),Integer.parseInt(arg[3]));
else if (arg.length == 3)
c.getPA().movePlayer(Integer.parseInt(arg[1]),Integer.parseInt(arg[2]),c.heightLevel);
}

Read full topic

item.title: Help pls
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Post that line and surrounding code, you probably added something outside the closing bracket.
